title: Mental Toughness (MT) Situational Response Training in Sports: Short-Intensive Course Based on Affective Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sports psychology and fieldwork/practical experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented training program for athletes and coaches. Delivers video, text, and interactive activities through a smartphone-based LMS

learning_goals: Learners can identify three types of situational contexts (contextual intelligence, attentional regulation, emotional regulation) that occur during competitions and design situation-specific coping strategies.
Learners can apply ACT (Acceptance and Commitment Therapy)-based training to practical tasks according to affective learning design principles.
Learners can implement and evaluate MT (Microteaching) training at team/individual levels using simulation modules within an LMS (Learning Management System).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
